sbtAddress.title: Soulbound Token Contract Address
sbtAddress.description: The address of the SBT contract that determines voting eligibility. Contract automatically burns tokens from contract-blacklisted users.

blacklist.title: Additional Blacklisted Addresses
blacklist.description: Array of addresses to exclude from voting (in addition to SBT contract blacklist)

delegationSpace.title: Delegation Space
delegationSpace.description: Snapshot space for delegation (defaults to current space)

useOnChainDelegation.title: Use On-Chain Delegation
useOnChainDelegation.description: Enable on-chain delegation support instead of Snapshot delegation

delegationContract.title: Delegation Contract Address
delegationContract.description: Contract address for on-chain delegation (required if useOnChainDelegation is true)
